gymPricingOptions.name: Basic Plan
gymPricingOptions.description: A great starting point for beginners who want access to essential gym equipment.

gymPricingOptions.name: Standard Plan
gymPricingOptions.description: Perfect for those who want more variety and group support in their workouts.

gymPricingOptions.name: Premium Plan
